text.text_translated:
The book 'Life of Pi' tells a very special and unusual story. It is about a young boy, Pi, from India. His ship had a big accident. Pi was then stuck on a small boat in the big Pacific Ocean. He was with a very wild tiger.
Yann Martel wrote this book. He is from Canada. It was his third book. It came out in 2001. After that, people bought more than seven million copies. They bought it all over the world. It won many prizes. It is in 41 languages.
His father worked for his country in other countries. When Martel was a child, he lived in many places. He lived in Costa Rica, Canada, France, and Mexico.
